translation.en: -KEVIN: Hello, Mr. Kim. -Kevin, how I can help you?

-你好 金先生
-凯文 需要什么？

-这是我朋友 罗杰
-你好 罗杰
我们要为同志骄傲游行表演

translation.en: and we would love to put our poster up in your window.

It's, uh, messy poster. Who make?

-是因为我们是同性恋吗？
-当然不是

why can't you be quiet, respectful gay, huh?

不能安静地
做个尊重别人的同性恋吗？
像安德森·库珀那样 你们懂

但他们不会对我大吼
说他们是同性恋

-游行不是为了大声 金先生…

translation.en: but we don't make big parade yelling at people,

“我们是韩国人！我们是韩国人！”

translation.en: Mr. Kim, are you homophobic? Roger.

-金先生 你是恐同吗？
-罗杰！

translation.en: And it's a hate crime, and I'm gonna report it.

这是仇恨犯罪 我要报警 -什么？
-罗杰…
恐… 恐洞 那我为什么

如果我是恐… 恐什么

translation.en: 15% Gay Discount only for the Gay Pride Week.

translation.en: So. how much would this be?
Regular, $2, but for you, with gay discount, $1.70.

translation.en: And how do you know if someone is gay?

-你有同性恋探测仪 金先生？
-对

translation.en: Ah. Well, we'll be sure to spread the word.

早晨的那些问候
“早上好 阿爸” “欧妈
你今天好漂亮”都哪里去了？

-谢谢 阿爸
-那是阿珍的台词
那谢谢阿珍 但是 是我说的

translation.en: You know, church is not only for worship the Jesus.

你知道 去教堂的目的
不只是敬仰耶稣

translation.en: Friend who is girl. Friend who is not girl.

欧妈
我不会为了和男孩子约会去教堂

好 那你帅气的

translation.en: And if they're cool and Korean,
they're not Christian. And if they're cool,

帅气又信基督教的韩国人 都是女的

阿忠就是帅气又信基督教的韩国人
他是女的吗？

translation.en: So, you're suggesting I date my brother?

find cool Christian Korean boy and we hook around.

I was told you were supporting gay pride

And keep talking to end of sentence.

别人有时候都说我太同性恋了 你只是假装的
百分百保证不是同性恋

Your brother's about to clean a car.

你只要
用你的员工家属折扣什么的

You stole the van when you were thirteen.
No. We stole the van when you were thirteen.

translation.en: Technically if your family owns it, it's not stealing.

translation.en: So, can you get me a rental?
Depends. Where you gonna wine and dine me?

别这样 是你欠我的
别这样 是你欠我的 为什么欠你？

translation.en: I'm seriously over-parented because you're not around.

就因为你不在家
我才被父母过度管教

translation.en: Hey, I still get more than my fair share from Umma.

对 但你上次和阿爸说话
是什么时候？

translation.en: So you're never going to talk to him again?

妹妹 你好 阿珍
我叫香农 是阿忠的经理

translation.en: And, I like to think, friend.

translation.en: would say it's employees only back here.
I know it must be hard for two people

translation.en: who grew up in the inner city and are rebellious by nature,

但规定还是要遵守的 明白？

translation.en: Okay, very nice to meet you.

一位女士问我们
是否见过她的宠物雪貂
还是告诉她 没见过吧

同志骄傲周 非常忙

身边根本见不到同性恋

What is the difference between a transgender and a transsexual?
No, is not a joke, Mr. Chin.

我在问你一个正经问题
我是真的不知道

我是真的不知道 打扰一下

没有 抱歉 我没…

No one can understand what you both talking about it!

我只是想知道
八五折的优惠是不是真的？

translation.en: That's the shortest month of the year.
But it's longer during leap year.
Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't see you come in.

Sorry, I think there's a misunderstanding.

Hi, hi, good to see you both. Mmm.

欧妈 这问题很不礼貌

Yes, I do go to church.

你还没意识到
但欧妈在帮你一个大忙

translation.en: Janet is not a baby anymore.
She is now full balloon, grown woman.

等她继承这家店的时候

Let's be clear, I'm not taking over the store

我们有八五折的同性恋优惠
仅此一周

I know you say it was college

-什么意思？

-她是同性恋！她是个同性恋！
-不

“近似女同性恋” 那个范围

translation.en: Oh my God, how did this turn into a thing?

translation.en: -It was nothing! -Sound like something to me.

-真的什么都没有！
-我听着感觉应该有点什么

-欧妈？

translation.zh:
-我们有家庭危机了

translation.en: -You have to talk to her. -No, I don't.
And you need to back off.

-但是阿珍…
-阿珍已经二十岁了

All you're doing is pushing her away.

-你们好 打扰一下
-我们先来的

-抱歉

translation.en: I can't find the price on this.
but this week, we have a discount only for the uh...

Oh, you is man who dress like girl?

打扮成女人 对 怎么了？

translation.en: It feels like me. Feels like home. Always has.

感觉这才是我自己
感觉这样比较自在 一直都是这样

-对 丢钱了 你看
嗨 阿珍 你饿了吗？

我给你做你最喜欢的…

我给你做你最喜欢的… 站住

translation.en: Where you get money for rental?
I got a discount from a friend.
Money is missing from store. Do you know what happen?

translation.en: Are you seriously accusing me of stealing money from you?

translation.en: -No. No one is accuse, just... JANET: I can't even...
translation.zh:
-不是 我没有责怪 只是…
-我真不敢相…

translation.en: Very nice meeting you, Mr. Kim.

translation.en: Ow! What, he is not woman.

translation.en: I never say she is steal.
You make her think you think she is steal.

translation.en: I never think she is steal.

-区别很大
-没有区别 哎呦

translation.en: I wonder if you is crazy,
doesn't mean I think you is crazy.
Appa, we is pushing her away like Jung!
translation.zh:
阿爸 我们在把她越推越远
就像对阿忠那样！

我们根本不用怀疑阿忠有没有偷
我们知道他真的偷了！

APPA: I don't need to say sorry.
-But you thought I did. -No, I wonder if you do.

but I'm the one being punished.
APPA: I not punish. I just talking.

I'm talking to Umma, I'm talking to door.

translation.en: so return the rental car, and we'll call it even.

地址在车钥匙上

translation.en: You do know why I told Appa to return the car right?

translation.en: Yah, so he doesn't have to say sorry.

终于等到了 佩吉
对 我想要无限短信

也可能是我自己离家出走的
我记不清了

translation.en: Okay, we're sharing. When I was 15, I got a perm.
translation.zh:
好吧 我们有相似的经历
我15岁的时候烫了卷发
不是… 那位就是我爸

translation.en: I don't know how he knew that I worked here.
translation.zh:
…不知道
他是怎么知道我在这里工作的
你可以帮我处理一下吗？

translation.en: I've been trying to get my cell phone plan upgraded
translation.zh: 我过去40分钟一直在等待接通电话

translation.en: Please? I will owe you big time.
translation.zh: 求你了？算我欠你一个大人情

translation.en: and I want unlimited texting in Canada and the U.S.
translation.zh: 我想要加拿大和美国的无限短信

translation.en: Not Brazil, not Costa Rica, not Paraguay.
translation.zh:
不要巴西 不要哥斯达黎加
不要巴拉圭

translation.en: -How big is your family? -He's the last one. Thanks.
translation.zh:
-你家到底有多少人？
-他是最后一个了 谢谢

translation.en: -So nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
-很高兴见到你
-很高兴见到你

-你怎么知道…
-在你开口之前 我想说

translation.en: I have an uncle, a fisherman, always reeked of fish
translation.zh:
我有个叔叔 是个渔夫
身上总是散发着臭鱼的味道

translation.en: so I never wanted to hug him.
translation.zh: 所以我从来不想拥抱他

translation.en: And then one day, he went out on his boat,
translation.zh: 后来有一天 他坐船出海

translation.en: and we never saw him again.
translation.zh: 我们就再也没有见过他
有时候偶尔会从墨西哥收到明信片

translation.en: But the point is, sometimes I yearn for a fishy hug.
translation.zh:
但问题是 我有时
会非常渴望一个臭鱼味道的拥抱

translation.en: No. I'm here to return car rental.
translation.zh: 不能 我是来还车的

translation.en: Let me take care of that for you.
-Do you need a ride? -Yah. I make coffee first.
translation.zh:
-需要我送你吗？
-对 我先泡一杯咖啡

translation.en: JANET: How did the drop off go?
Shannon, store manager, she drive me home.
translation.zh: 香农 店铺经理 她开车送我回来的

translation.en: She talk about Cape Breton, fishy uncle,
translation.zh: 她聊到凯普·布莱顿 渔夫叔叔

translation.en: but coffee is good. -Did you see anyone else?
translation.zh:
-但是咖啡不错
-你看到其他人了吗？

translation.en: It's car rental, not international airport.
translation.zh: 那是汽车租赁公司 不是国际机场

-嗨
-抱歉 不用了 面试结束了

translation.en: Look, you is cool Christian, Korean boy,
translation.zh:
听着
你是帅气又信基督教的韩国男孩 但就算金太太喜欢你 就算我喜欢你

translation.en: but even if Mrs. Kim like you, even if I like you,
translation.zh: 但就算金太太喜欢你 就算我喜欢你

translation.en: Janet has to like you. You understand?
translation.zh: 需要阿珍喜欢你才行 你明白了吗？

translation.en: What is Korea day of Independence?
